channel.description: Recent content in Entrepreneurship on Andrés Max

item.title: 10 Reasons Founders SHOULD Consider A Side Hustle
Embrace Change
item.description: Holding on to situations for as long as we can is a source of pain in our lives.

item.title: A tale of smoothies and business
item.description: Two days ago I left the gym just before 9am. I was thirsty and hungry when I walked by a smoothie stand.

item.title: Why you should ignore your competitors
item.description: I’ve never understood founders who build companies or products just as a reaction to what their competitors are doing.

item.title: Dream, start, go slow & learn as you go
item.description: The tech industry today moves fast as f$ck. It is insane, and can drive us (or, at least me) insane. Don’t get me wrong, I love the industry.

item.title: We All Need Time Off, And That's Ok
item.description: Just last week I came across an article written by Paul Boag from Headscape aptly titled You Are Not A Machine. You Are Not Alone..

item.title: 5 Things I've Learned From Starting A Company
item.description: As far as I know there is no holy grail of things you should do to make a company successful.

item.title: Our Work-Life Balance, Will We Get It Right?
item.description: The topic of the future of work-life balance has been catching my interest lately.

item.title: Negotiate Time, Not Quality
item.description: I was very naive at negotiating when I first started Ideaware.

item.title: You're The Average Of The Five People You Spend Most Time With
item.description: Here’s a favorite quote of mine from motivational speaker Jim Rohn:
